resources.string: New to Skynet? Create an account now
Could not initialize messaging system. Please make sure you have Google Play Services installed.
Username or password incorrect. Please try again.
We could not restore your session, maybe you have changed your password. Please log in again.
Your session store was corrupted. Please log in again.
Sorry, this account name is already taken. Please try a different one.
Sorry, this account name is invalid. Please try a different one.
The passwords you entered do not match.
The version of Skynet you are currently is too old to connect. Please update to v%s.
The version of Skynet you are currently using is reaching its end of life. We recommend updating to v%s.
Your account has been created successfully. To activate your account, please click on the link we sent you via email.
